basics.name: TUTOR
basics.label: Professional Medical Coding and Billing
basics.summary: Self-motivated and detail oriented individual with comprehensive training in ICD-10-CM/PCS, CPT and HCPCS II coding. Focused individual who has demonstrated ability to work well independently while actively coordinating with other team members. Seeking medical coding position.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Tutored homeschool students in weekly high school prep courses. Researched, planned and facilitated studies in Latin, Debate, Literature, Composition, Algebra, Science, Geography and History. Provided parent mentoring and support.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Tracked financial transactions. Monitored accounts receivable, accounts payable. Negotiated with vendors and customers. Produced profit and loss statements.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Presented product demonstrations. Communicated with hosts and customers and provided product support. Recruited and mentored new consultants. Won numerous sales and recruiting level recognitions and promotions.

education.institution: Career Step Professional Medical Coding and Billing Program
